name: Promise Across the Wall
description:
**PLEASE READ!

Sound ON.

Estimated play through time: 5 minutes. This game has multiple endings, play it to after dawn to see easter egg. 

There is a timer for each round (on the top center of your screen)

*READING THE OBJECTIVES CAREFULLY IF HELPS WITH PLAY THROUGH A LOT!

------------------------------------------------------------------

Introduction

Embark on a journey to reunite two childhood friends torn apart by a political wall in a divided town. Upon starting, you will find the two friends alone in a divided town. Help the boy and girl overcome obstacles and evade enemies to find the key that unlocks the door on the wall, culminating in a heartwarming reunion on the girl's birthday. "Promise Across the Wall" is an adventure game that will test your skills, challenge your mind, and warm your heart. Are you ready to fulfill the promise?

--------------------------------------------------------------------

A, D to move, Space to jump, hold space to climb.

Leave a comment if you unlocked the hidden ending!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first solo game jam!! Would love to hear some feedback!

UDC #25
